nodes.text: Myriapodologists were individuals who specialized in the study of certain arthropods. The Coruscant Zoo employed myriapodologists, and in 7955 C.R.C. they identified the creatures used by the bounty hunter Zam Wesell in an attempt to assassinate Senator Padmé Amidala as Indoumodo kouhuns.
Myriapodologists were first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
